description:
Catarina is suddenly faced with her own "judgment event." The cafeteria is abuzz, leaving Catarina`s mind in a panic as she suspects her doom flag has been set at last. Then Geordo appears with the members of the student council. The noble girls continue to condemn Catarina as the student council members read the evidence they compiled against her. Then Maria, the alleged victim, speaks...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hametsu no Toki ga Otozurete Shimatta... Zenpen
L`heure de la fin funeste a sonné... (Partie 1)
The Moment of My Doom Arrived... Part 1
破滅の時が訪れてしまった... 前編
